special_abilities.name: Shapechanger.
descriptions: Baba Lysaga can use an action to polymorph into a swarm of insects (flies) or back into her true form. While in swarm form, she has a walking speed of 5 feet and a flying speed of 30 feet. Anything she is wearing transforms with her, but nothing she is carrying does.

special_abilities.name: Blessing of Mother Night.
descriptions: Baba Lysaga is shielded against divination magic, as though protected by a nondetection spell.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Baba Lysaga is a 16th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). Baba Lysaga has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): acid splash, fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): acid splash, fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, sleep, witch bolt
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, sleep, witch bolt

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): crown of madness, enlarge/reduce, misty step
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): crown of madness, enlarge/reduce, misty step

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, fireball, lightning bolt
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, fireball, lightning bolt

descriptions.raw: 4th level (3 slots): blight, Everard's black tentacles, polymorph
descriptions.hyperlinked: 4th level (3 slots): blight, Everard's black tentacles, polymorph

descriptions.raw: 6th level (1 slot): programmed illusion, true seeing
7th level (1 slot): finger of death, mirage arcane
descriptions.hyperlinked: 7th level (1 slot): finger of death, mirage arcane

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Baba Lysaga makes three attacks with her quarterstaff

actions.name: Quarterstaff.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) bludegoning damage, or 8 (1d8+4) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

actions.name: Summon Swarms of Insects (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
descriptions: Baba Lysaga summons 1d4 swarms of insects. A summoned swarm appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Baba Lysaga and acts as her ally. It remains until it dies or until Baba Lysaga dismisses it as an action.
